TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted; it's actually known as "English", but hey, what's in a name?

I wish I had a thousand dollars.

Granted; but it is smeared with mustard.

I wish I had a wish

Granted; your next wish must be for you to gain gills and be teleported to the middle of the desert.

I wish for some sugar.

Granted! However, some ants get in during the middle of the night and steal it all!

I wish for a new hat.
I wish for this world to be free of corruption.

Granted. Now Mars is corrupted.

I wish for stuff that I like but don't currently have.

Granted. Your greed causes the world to despise you, and you are executed.

I wish for a MackleSmore.

Granted, but you choke on it and die very slowly. Nobody can save you.

I wish I was more prepared.

Granted, you are prepared for everything. And you wait for something to happen. And wait. But nothing happens, and you die slowly while all you preparations crumble under the force of time.

I wish I had a cute little dragon

Granted. It burns your house down by accident, but it does so in a cute way.

I wish for another hat, my neck is a little sore from the last one I wished for...

Granted, But it's made of barbed wire and insulation.

I wish I could make anything appear.

Granted. Anything appears, but you don't have choice over what. On the first use, 11.2 kg of Ununoctium appears inside you, killing you very quickly.

I wish I had elemental powers.

Granted. You now have the element of surprise! you use it and are so surprised, you have a mental breakdown.

I wish for something to help with all the cuts and scratches I got from my new hat.

Granted. It help to exacerbate the cuts and scratches.

I wish I was incapable of feeling strong surprise.

Granted, but you are now more susceptible to weak surprise.

I wish that I had a bandage for those nasty cuts on my head.

Granted, but for every cut you bandage up, two more will appear on other parts of your body.

I wish I never had to sleep.

Granted. However, your pineal gland still acts like you do, and you get permanently tired.

I wish that someone else had my hat.

Granted, it's a zovgork from the planet Serdlon 9. They're allergic to hats, so he eats you.

I wish to have some lemonade.

Granted. I cut you, fill the lemonade with salt, and pour it into the wound

I wish for better story telling skills

Granted. You now read horror stories that are R-18+ to children under the age of 10.

I wish that the Kracken would awaken and kill everybody. Maybe Cthulhu too...

Granted, but someone has changed the definition of "everybody" to "The Spacemonkey".

I wish that I was better at programming in Pascal.
i wish a stick

Granted, but the stick is 20 tonnes and it crushes you.

I wish for the ability to actually get to Duna for once.

Granted. You are in your spacecraft that makes the journey, and it lacks oxygen.

I wish my civ 5 game was going better

Granted, but your real life takes a sharp downward spiral.

I wish for some water.
